snippet.title: Nutz Revenge Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Roll into a nutty adventure in this action-packed 2D platformer! In this epic battle of Nuts vs Rodents, you take turns controlling our fearless heroes as they unleash their unique abilities, navigate through tricky levels, and face off against colossal rodent bosses. Join Pete & Penny Peanut, Sgt Acorn, Walter Walnut, and Peggy Pistachio as they team up to reclaim stolen life-giving Power Berries from the evil rodent gang! With vibrant visuals, quirky yet charming characters, and a world full of collectables, prepare for a nutty journey like no other! Can you help the Nutz squad enact their revenge upon the evil rodent gang?? 

Wishlist on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/2952950/Nutz_Revenge
